mean_cn: n. 社团，联盟；  vt. 使…结盟，与…联合；  vi. 结盟，团结
mean_en: a group of sports teams that play against each other; a group of people or nations who have combined for a particular purpose
deformation_desc: league也可以表示长度哦，一里格约为5.56公里。
sentence: You are so good! You should join our soccer league!
sentence_trans: 你很厉害！你应该加入我们的足球社团！
